turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I placed an order last week, order number #12345, and it still hasn't shipped. What's going on?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Let me check the status of order #12345 for you. One moment please...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, this is so frustrating. I needed this package for a birthday party this weekend.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. According to our system, order #12345 is currently being processed and is scheduled to ship out tomorrow. You should receive a tracking number via email once it ships. The estimated delivery date is currently Tuesday.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Tuesday?! That's too late! Is there any way to expedite the shipping? I'm willing to pay extra.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I can definitely look into that for you. Let me see if we can upgrade the shipping. Can you confirm the shipping address associated with order #12345? Unfortunately, I don't seem to be able to access it at this time.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: It's 123 Main Street, Anytown, CA 91234. But honestly, if you can't guarantee it'll arrive by Saturday, just cancel the order. I'll buy it somewhere else. This is ridiculous.
